name: BloodTransfusion
title: Blood Transfusion
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent blood transfusion.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with blood transfusion.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes exchange blood transfusion, hypertransfusion, cut-down blood transfusion, transfusion of blood product, concepts of blood transfusion not relevant to whole blood or packed red blood cell products.)
